item.title: The DeepSeek sell-off: What major analysts are saying about Nvidia, possible AI bubble popping
item.description: Despite the deep losses in Nvidia, many analysts saw it as a buying opportunity.

item.title: Goldman Sachs upgrades Twilio, sees more than 35% upside ahead
item.description: Even after a 20% surge on Friday, Goldman Sachs thinks Twilio shares have further room to run.

item.title: Take-Two Interactive gets an upgrade from UBS as 'Grand Theft Auto VI' hype builds
item.description: Take-Two Interactive Software has "a grand pipeline" ahead thanks to its upcoming release of "Grand Theft Auto VI" video game, according to UBS.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these dividend stocks for stable returns
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks, including AT&T and Diamondback Energy

item.title: Analysts list these Chinese stock plays to help investors ride out tariff volatility
item.description: Tariffs or not, Chinese markets are still waiting for earnings to turn around, analysts point out.
